entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Boolean should implement IBitwiseOperators #103141
  • [API Proposal]: System.IO.File to have a method to read a file line by line #103137
  • [mono][aot] Write a tool to collect mono-aot-cross inputs and rsp files from an msbuild binlog #103136
  • HttpClient.Timeout seems to be canceling before expected #103134
  • [mobile][diagnostics] Format native crash output using llvm-symbolizer markup #103132
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient telemetry extensibility #103130
    9.0.0
  • Null ThreadHandle in .NET 8 #103129
  • [HttpStress] All runs of `POST Multipart Data` failing #103128
    9.0.0
  • Assertion error in `WasmTestOnV8-ST-System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #103121
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Use our python package on macos again #103120
    9.0.0
  • illink: Unhandled exception. Mono.Linker.InternalErrorException: Type ShareExtensionTest.ShareViewController already has applied All. #103115
  • NoWorkload-NoWebcil-ST-Wasm.Build.Tests.WorkItemExecution #103114
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on IPAddress & IPNetwork #103111
    9.0.0
  • GC: Enable DATAS by default #103110
    9.0.0
  • NET8.0，Socket，Why can I send so much data continuously #103107

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Disposable Enumerable #103123
  • CultureInfo "arb" is not a Textinfo.IsRightToLeft Language #103131
  • SPMI Replay failing sporadically #102773
  • .Net 8 Android App crashes only in release on physical device #98232
  • Improve documentation for common globalization issues #96101
    Future
  • Unable to unload AOT compiled library of a highly multithreaded .net library using dlcose() #103028
  • GB1030 dotnet info #102174
    9.0.0
  • NullReferenceException within Thread.StartCallback #102573
  • GC test failure on arm64 mono interpreter #103124
    9.0.0
  • string.StartsWith returns `True` when comparing with some control characters #103116
  • Add string keyed dictionary ReadOnlySpan<char> lookup support #27229
    9.0.0
  • BadImageFormatException when mixing AOT and Interpreter assemblies #102867
  • Add a STJ feature flag treating non-optional constructor parameters as required #100075
    9.0.0
  • sslStream.NegotiatedApplicationProtocol is empty after TLS1.3 renegotiation on Windows #102731
    9.0.0
  • NoWorkload-NoWebcil-ST-Wasm.Build.Tests.WorkItemExecution #103084
  • RestoreTask failure #103113
  • NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 9.0. #103083
  • NopPromptTemplateFactory? #103090

PullRequests

Created

  • [NO REVIEW] Implement DisposeAsync on HttpContent and HttpResponseMessage #103145
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add basic support for folding and normalizing hwintrinsic trees in morph #103143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dispose IDisposables in RegexGenerator #103142
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Allow TypePreserve info to be applied multiple times #103140
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Introduce IBufferedLogRecordMetadata #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • TypeDefinitionDocument documentation #103135
    area-Meta
  • Set proper options for connected IPv6 raw socket #103127
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix ArgIteratorTemplate::GetNextOffset() for struct{Arr[], float} #103125
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable downlevel tests for non-main branches in non-simple WasmBuildTests #103118
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Remove vestigial HAVE_LARGE_SNPRINTF_SUPPORT checks #103106
    area-PAL-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono] Fix hardcoded .NET 8.0 string in iOS sample #103117
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Build and consume FMA and Permute node operands in standard order #103100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Scan intrinsic methods if we're taking address #103109
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use JSON source generator in SSE tests #103126
    area-System.Net
  • [mono] Don't allocate the renamable vars buffer in the interpreter unless optimizing #102563
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Stop setting problematic runtime feature switches #102934
    needs-area-label
  • Enable CET shadow stack compatibility in `apphost`/`singlefilehost` by default #103007
    area-HostModel
  • [release/9.0-preview5] [workloads] Releases moved #103133
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host
  • Optimize HttpUtility.JavaScriptStringEncode by using SearchValues #102917
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the `ArgIteratorTemplate::GetNextOffset()` return argOfs for 'ELEMENT_TYPE_VALUETYPE' which is flattened liking struct{Arr[], float}. #103108
    community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, needs-area-label
  • Add a regression test for double Content-Length header in HttpWebRequest #102989
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Avoid a few allocations in StringContent #103008
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Remove some uses of #if BIGENDIAN #103097
    needs-area-label
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the TestVector256() size alignment within `src/tests/Interop/StructPacking/StructPacking.cs`. #103112
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm] Fix emsdk check #103027
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement `JsonSerializerOptions.RespectRequiredConstructorParameters` #103096
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Don't query for negotiated ALPN protocol after renegotiation on Windows #102751
    area-System.Net.Security
  • need to account for unsuccessful commit case when hardlimit isn't on #102961
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Base64Fuzzer to the repo #103011
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Fix type of args when inlining method #102801
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.x
  • [workloads] Add net current to current names to make them match in net10 #103050
    area-Workloads
  • [workload] Use the same naming as net9 workload #103049
    area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [interp] handle box + brtrue/brfalse and box+isinst+unbox.any patterns up front #103052
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Re-write Android PBKDF2 one shot in Java #103016
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2468448 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Start running pri1 tests on native AOT #103069
    needs-area-label
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Upgrade to CMake 3.26 #103088
    area-Infrastructure
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • [mono] Migrate more ghashtables to simdhash #102476
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0] Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #102216
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Fix WhiteSpace validation in HttpHeaders #102693
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Minor cleanup of the Vector64/128/256/512 implementations to improve fallbacks #103095
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Added SVE `Prefetch*` APIs. #103094
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use the new lock type in TimerQueue #103104
    area-System.Threading
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #103076
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable layout traversal in LSRA by default #103099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typo in ComInterfaceInfo.OptionsAreValid #102384
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Wrap Cancelled Request with OCE instead of QuicException #103081
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] Fix: `HybridGlobalization` Invariant function differs from non-Hybrid #103037
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [WIP] Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Prototype an aggressive SSA-based dead code elimination phase #103087
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][NativeAOT] Disable `MH_SUBSECTIONS_VIA_SYMBOLS` and enable `-dead_strip` by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix `SwiftError` variable offset calculation #103043
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
